name: Once upon a flower
description: Once upon a flower is a game in which you have to take care of a newborn sign of life- flower, you do that by clicking a screen or pressing space when a drop of water is inside a flower. For each drop(which leaves a blue mark) you collect you get 25 points, and the flower will stop shrinking. If you manage to get a drop of water in the center(which will leave a yellow mark) you  get  100 points and the flower will grow! Currently the only losing condition of the game is if you let a drop slip by 3 times;  I was trying my best to make it so that when there aren't any drops in the flower and if you click/press space you also lose a life,  but due to lack of time (and knowledge) I wasn't able to implement it perfectly, so you can spam if you want :D (It's a FEATURE, NOT a BUG, Okay?)
